name: Codemasters F1 2019 Bridge
shortDescription: C# Bridge for streaming Codemasters F1 2019 telemetry to Quix
longDescription: C# Bridge for streaming Codemasters F1 2019 telemetry to Quix. This bridge is capable of streaming the game's telemetry (PC or Console). Note that this bridge must be run locally on the same network as the game

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: The topic where game data will be output.
